header.title: Fragment Extractor Generator
header.abstract: This document describes the fragment extractor generator of Cocoon

s1.title: Fragment Extractor Generator
s1.p: FragmentExtractor is a transformer-generator pair which is designed to allow sitemap managers to extract certain nodes from a SAX stream and move them into a separate pipeline. The main use for this is to extract inline SVG images and serve them up through a separate pipeline, usually serializing them to PNG or JPEG format first.
